explains: adj. 无保护的；未设防的；不受关税保护的
v. 无保护（unprotect 的过去分词）
wordGroup: unprotected sex 不安全性行为

sentences.en: Exposure of unprotected skin to the sun carries the risk of developing skin cancer.
sentences.cn: 无保护的皮肤在太阳暴晒下有患皮肤癌的危险。

sentences.en: The landing beaches would be unprotected.
sentences.cn: 登陆的海滩可能没有设防。

sentences.en: Machinery was often unprotected and accidents were frequent.
sentences.cn: 机器常裸露着，因此事故频仍。
